name: W3CDom_asStringTest
description: Unit tests for the W3CDom.asString method, focusing on different scenarios including properties and doctype handling.

test_cases.name: testAsString_withPropertiesAndDoctype
test_cases.description: Tests the W3CDom.asString method with properties and doctype, ensuring the correct string representation is returned.

test_cases.name: testAsString_transformerException
test_cases.description: Tests the W3CDom.asString method to ensure it throws an IllegalArgumentException when invalid properties are passed, simulating a TransformerException.
